urls.title: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis calls state ‘God’s waiting room’
urls.description: Florida Gov. Ron DeSantis sparked outrage by referring to the Sunshine State as “God’s waiting room” during a briefing about the coronavirus pandemic. “Florida is ground zero for the nursing...
